alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 14 at 2:34AM CST until November 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Davis Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
